title: Password changed, reset sent to a email I no longer have
body: Hello my password for this account may have been changed because I only use one, and was confronted with a message that the combination didn't work, after clicking reset password I realized it sent the link to a email I don't have anymore that I forgot to change on the account or possibly a hackers email. I know i should contact actual support on this but I cant log into the support page without the password, my account was already logged in on this board page so this is my only option. If any support employee can find a way to help me I will be really grateful.

replies.body: Don't worry, we can help!  You can reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), which doesn't require logging in to the ticketing center.  Our account recovery team will review your case, and assist with updating your info.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
